original_text: He also rebelled against King Nebuchadnezzar, who had made him take an oath in God’s name. He became stiff-necked and hardened his heart and would not turn to the Lord, the God of Israel.
korean_text: 또한 느부갓네살 왕이 그를 그의 하나님을 가리켜 맹세하게 하였으나 그가 왕을 배반하고 목을 곧게 하며 마음을 완악하게 하여 이스라엘 하나님 여호와께로 돌아오지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: He also rebelled against King Nebuchadnezzar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또 느부갓네살 왕을 대적하여 반역하였고

sentences.original_text: who had made him take an oath in God's name
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 이름으로 그에게 맹세하게 한 자였느니라

sentences.original_text: and would not turn to the Lord
